perturbation.original_text: If Reseller fails to submit Orders with an aggregate value equal to or greater than the MOQ, then Reseller shall pay Supplier a sum equal to the shortfall, within 30 days after the end of the Initial Term. Upon payment of such amount, Seller shall deliver the Products paid for to Reseller in a commercially reasonable timeframe (and in no event any later than 150 days from the date such payment is received in full) to be sold by Reseller in accordance with this Agreement as contemplated by the last sentence of Section 12.4.
perturbation.changed_text: If Reseller fails to submit Orders with an aggregate value equal to or greater than the MOQ, then Reseller shall pay Supplier a sum equal to the shortfall, within 60 days after the end of the Initial Term. Upon payment of such amount, Seller shall deliver the Products paid for to Reseller in a commercially reasonable timeframe (and in no event any later than 90 days from the date such payment is received in full) to be sold by Reseller in accordance with this Agreement as contemplated by the last sentence of Section 12.4.
perturbation.explanation: The payment deadline for MOQ shortfall is changed from 30 days to 60 days, and the delivery timeframe is shortened from 150 days to 90 days, creating contradictory deadlines.

perturbation.original_text: Thereafter, this Agreement shall automatically be renewed for successive 1-year terms (each a "Renewal Term", and together with the Initial Term, the "Term"). Following the Initial Term, either Party may terminate this Agreement without cause upon written notice to the other Party of at least 3 months.
perturbation.changed_text: Thereafter, this Agreement shall automatically be renewed for successive 1-year terms (each a "Renewal Term", and together with the Initial Term, the "Term"). Following the Initial Term, either Party may terminate this Agreement without cause upon written notice to the other Party of at least 6 months.
perturbation.explanation: The notice period for termination without cause has been changed from 3 months to 6 months, creating a contradiction in termination terms.

perturbation.original_text:
Address to which Orders should be sent Supplier's Ordering Email address: logistics@walabot.com

Address for Notices to the Supplier Vayyar Ltd. 3 Avraham Giron St., POB. 325, Yehud 5621717, Israel
perturbation.changed_text:
Address to which Orders should be sent Supplier's Ordering Email address: orders@vayyar.com

Address for Notices to the Supplier Vayyar Ltd. 5 Avraham Giron St., POB. 325, Yehud 5621717, Israel
perturbation.explanation: The email address for orders has been changed from logistics@walabot.com to orders@vayyar.com. The street address has been modified to 5 Avraham Giron St. instead of 3. This introduces uncertainty regarding where orders should be sent and the correct address for official notices.
